text: maryaminre makan isa parannu: nannalute raksitavaya allahuve, nannalkk ni akasatt ninn oru bhaksanattalika irakkittarename. nannalkkâ€Œ, nannalile adyattilullavannum, avasanattilullavannum oru perunnalum, ninre pakkal ninnulla oru drstantavumayirikkanam atâ€Œ. nannalkk ni upajivanam nalkukayum ceyyename. ni upajivanam nalkunnavaril erravum uttamananallea
